title: Local driver (dev)
description: Implement local driver to start sidecar as child process for development.
requirements: Spawn Bun process for apps/sidecar with session env and volume path
Generate one-time reg token and pass via env
plan: Implement provision: spawn, wait for /health, return endpoint and token
Implement status: check child process and /health
Implement destroy: kill process and cleanup temp resources
expected_outcome: Local sessions start with sidecar process for dev.
acceptance_criteria: Provision resolves within timeout with endpoint
Destroy terminates process and frees port
test_plan: Spawn a session via POST /v1/sessions in dev and observe sidecar register
